item.title: Building Emulators in FSharp
item.description: So I wanted to briefly talk about what I’ve been up to lately. I’ve been doing a spot of compiler hacking, working on improving type Providers and generally tinkering with concepts relating to macros etc. I’ve also been tinkering with the Elixir and Rust programming languages which I like a lot. I might write about those things at a later time depending on my train of thought which can be quite disjoint. What was I talking about again? :-)
